SME.translation[0].definitions[0].defini: (small or medium enterprise) a company whose turnover and number of people working in it are lower than a particular amount
SME.translation[1].definitions[0].defini: small and medium (-sized) enterprise; fairly small companies that are usually based in one place and owned by one person or small group of people
SME.translation[1].definitions[0].exampl: SMEs play an important role in sustaining domestic and regional economic growth.
